title: Esther O'Reilly on Jordan Peterson and the Last Battle
description:
Esther has been writing up a storm about JBP. Time to ask some questions about this young Evangelical apologist. Here are some links to her work. 
http://patheos.com/blogs/youngfogey/sam-harris-asks-questions-jordan-peterson-cant-answer
https://www.premierchristianity.com/Blog/What-s-stopping-Jordan-Peterson-from-rejecting-Jesus-resurrection
https://www.premierchristianradio.com/Shows/Saturday/Unbelievable/Episodes/Unbelievable-Peterson-vs-Harris-atheism-and-the-alt-right-Esther-O-Reilly-and-James-Croft
http://thefederalist.com/2018/08/01/new-atheists-views-murder-prove-jordan-peterson-right-atheism-leads/

Esther has been writing up a storm about JBP. Time to ask some questions about this young Evangelical apologist. Here are some links to her work. 
http://patheos.com/blogs/youngfogey/sam-harris-asks-questions-jordan-peterson-cant-answer
https://www.premierchristianity.com/Blog/What-s-stopping-Jordan-Peterson-from-rejecting-Jesus-resurrection
https://www.premierchristianradio.com/Shows/Saturday/Unbelievable/Episodes/Unbelievable-Peterson-vs-Harris-atheism-and-the-alt-right-Esther-O-Reilly-and-James-Croft
http://thefederalist.com/2018/08/01/new-atheists-views-murder-prove-jordan-peterson-right-atheism-leads/
